doc.field: Irishrep.org is the website of the Irish Repertory Theatre. The website contains information on current and past productions, script submission series, and membership programs.

The Irish Repertory Theatre YouTube channel features videos of trailers for upcoming performances at the theater related to Irish and Irish-American works, interviews with actors and directors, gala performances, and their #TheShowMustGoOnline series created during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of web.ovationtix.com/trs/cal/32325 and irishrep.org in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.
Robots.txt (a piece of code designed to limit crawler activity within a website) was ignored.
In 2023, YouTube URLs were changed to better capture the videos on the channel.

Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.
